channel.title: Bandos boots glitch fix
channel.description:
hi my name is mortl dragon
i need help fixing a glitch in my source, the glitch is that when i spawn bandos boots or kill bandos, the boots are null how do i change it so that it is bandos boots, and not a null? another question is how do i make a nonexisting item a weapon? such as the staff of lite?

item.title: Bandos boots glitch fix
item.dc:creator: @mod_mortl mod mortl
item.description:
@mod_mortl wrote:

ooo ok ty jmod
now it works ty

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos boots glitch fix
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

a Null item means that the model of the item is not correct, you need to go into the client and find out the item ID in your Class8.java, then you can fix the item buy adding it to the Array in your Item.java.

Read full topic
